General.Name: American Eagle Gold Corp
General.Description: American Eagle Gold Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of gold and copper deposits in North America. Its flagship is the NAK copper-gold property located in British Columbia. American Eagle Gold Corp. was formerly known as Pacific Precious Inc. and changed its name to American Eagle Gold Corp. in October 2020. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 55 University Avenue, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5J 2H7
